Class MenuManager

java.lang.Object
com.csce331.project2.ui.MenuManager
public class MenuManager extends Object
MenuManager handles menu item operations for the manager interface. Provides functionality to view, add, edit, and delete menu items.
Author:
Nikhil

  • Method Details

    • createMenuPanel

      public JPanel createMenuPanel()
      Creates and returns a JPanel containing the menu management interface. The panel includes a table displaying all menu items and buttons for CRUD operations.
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the menu management interface
